verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gracious Spirit Holy Ghost Taught by Thee we covet most Of Thy gifts at Pentecost Holy heavenly Love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love is kind and suffers long Love is meek and thinks no wrong Love than death itself more strong Therefore give us Love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prophecy will fade away Melting in the light of day Love will ever with us stay Therefore give us Love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faith will vanish into sight Hope be emptied in delight Love in heaven Will shine more bright Therefore give us Love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Faith and Hope and Love we see Joining hand in hand agree But the greatest of the three And the best is Love{/lang-eng}
